name: Emma Houndstooth Clutch
description:
Brown and cream houndstooth comes together with a big bow to add some style to your wardrobe. The outer fabric is from a women's blazer from the 80s, and the lining is from a blouse. 


-Dimensions: 6"h x 10.5"w x 1.5"d at bottom
-Magnetic snap closure and pocket inside measuring 4.5"h x 5"w
-Comes with card detailing origins of the bag
-100% recycled or re-purposed fabric
-One of a kind

-Spot Clean 

-Each bag comes with a plantable paper hang-tag. Plant your tag and watch it bloom!

name: Paige
description:
Pretty paisley clutch that adds variety and texture to even the simplest outfit. The outer fabric is made from a skirt from the 90s while the lining is from a blouse from the 80s. The bag is accented with a variety of metal studs. 


-Dimensions: 6"h x 10.5"w x 1.5"d at bottom
-Magnetic snap closure and pocket inside measuring 4.5"h x 5"w
-Comes with card detailing origins of the bag
-100% recycled or re-purposed fabric
-One of a kind

name: Kylie
description:
Ruffles cascade down the front of this wristlet in a new plaid pattern.  The outer fabric is from a skirt while the lining is from a blouse. The slightly roomier shape allows for more space for your smart phone and all those other vital belongings. 


-Dimensions: 5.25"h x 7.5"w
-Zipper closure and detachable strap measuring 6.75" long 
-Comes with a card detailing the bag's backstory
-100% re-purposed or recycled fabric
-One of a kind

name: Tamara
description:
Flashback to the 70's! The clutch is sourced from 1970's upholstery fabric while the lining is from a 1960's dress. This floral beauty is topped off with delicate flowers made from a 70's dress and beads from a Victorian Era lamp. 

-Dimensions: 6"h x 11"w x 1.5"d at bottom
-Magnetic closure and inner pocket measuring 3.5"h x 4.5"w
-100% re-purposed and recycled fabric
-Comes with a card detailing the bag's origin
-One of a kind

name: Fleur
description:
Dark green wool clutch with flower details. The clutch fabric is from a men's coat from the 1960's and the lining is from an ottoman cover.  

-Size
-Magnetic closure and inner pocket
-Comes with a card explaining the origin of the bag
-One of a kind
